LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkKillSwitch.label: mechlink kill switch
LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkKillSwitch.description: Destroys the mechlink upon user death by overloading the interface.
LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkTrigger.label: temporary mechlink
LanguageData.USAC_TempMechlinkTrigger.description: Subscription-based bandwidth control service via USAC satellite network. Provides 6 bandwidth. Lost upon brain death or service expiration.
